samples.name: USGS_SEA_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_LAND_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_MIXED_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

samples.name: 200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

samples.name: 100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

samples.name: 40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

samples.name: MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

samples.name: MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)

bands.name: LSM
bands.description: Land sea mask for atmospheric model (0-1)

bands.name: U
bands.description: Wind - zonal component at lowest model level (m s-1)

bands.name: V
bands.description: Wind - meridional component at lowest model level (m s-1)

bands.name: Q
bands.description: Specific humidity at lowest model level (kg/kg)

bands.name: NSSS
bands.description: North-South surface stress, accumulated since start of forecast (N m-2 s-1)

bands.name: EWSS
bands.description: East-West surface stress, accumulated since start of forecast (N m-2 s-1)

bands.name: SSR
bands.description: Surface solar radiation: net downward shortwave flux at surface, accumulated since start of forecast (W m-2 s-1)

bands.name: STR
bands.description: Surface thermal radiation: net downward thermal radiative flux at surface, accumulated since start of forecast (W m-2 s-1)

bands.name: SSHF
bands.description: Net downward sensible heat flux, accumulated since start of forecast (W m-2 s-1)

bands.name: SLHF
bands.description: Net downward latent heat flux, accumulated since start of forecast (W m-2 s-1)

bands.name: WIND
bands.description: Wave model 10 metre wind speed (m s-1)

bands.name: UST
bands.description: Friction velocity from surface layer model (m/s)

bands.name: SSWVL1
bands.description: Scaled volumetric soil water layer 1 (m3 m-3)

bands.name: F1
bands.description: Flags indicating the quality of the ECMWF data

bands.name: F2
bands.description: Flags indicating the quality of the ECMWF data

bands.name: D1
bands.description: Flags indicating degradation of the ECMWF data (use of the backup instead of the nominal interpolation method)

bands.name: D2
bands.description: Flags indicating degradation of the ECMWF data (use of the backup instead of the nominal interpolation method)

bands.name: Land_Sea_Mask
bands.description: Flag indicating Land/Sea USGS content, Coastline distance, and Ice content
